abstract: Leader of gay Catholic groups commend Pope Francis for saying Roman Catholic Church and all Christians should apologize to gay people for mistreatment, and urge church to act accordingly.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis’ comments about the church’s needing to apologize to gays for previous mistreatment must be followed by changes in teachings, the groups said.

headline.main: Gay Catholic Groups Want Pope Francis to Do More Than Apologize
headline.print_headline: Gay Catholic Groups Want  Vatican to Act After Apology
